gist.summary: Updates the Google Summer of Code (GSOC) page with new mentor assignments and improved project organization logic.
gist.impact: Participants will see clearer mentor allocations and a more structured project list.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a summer camp counselor or mentor, reviewing a project map or board in a sunny outdoor setting. Represents the GSOC update and organization.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee as a summer camp counselor reviewing a pixelated project map. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and sunny pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Pixel text 'GSOC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee as a summer camp counselor reviewing a pixelated project map. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and sunny pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Pixel text 'GSOC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
